TopicTitle: KSP 1.4 is crashing due to my Mun flag?

Articles.Content:
Both my 1.3.1 and 1.4 version is crashing. Im trying to uninstall mods in order to get a working version, but the latest crash has several references to a flag planted on the Mun in my save game:

Quote

Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "flag (First MUN landing)/model/flagpolecollider"

This line is repeated multiple time in the crashlog. My output_log is shared from dropbox here
Remove kopernicous if you hAve it installed 1.4 is incompatible till its updated.

8 hours ago, Carzy2998 said:

Remove kopernicous if you hAve it installed 1.4 is incompatible till its updated.

 

Thanks a bunch, seems to be working now.
